answers.answer: Congrats to you! 20 minutes of pushing, I'm jealous took me an hour, and that's baby number 5! Could you imagine how much he would of weighed if he went full term?! Best of luck to you both!!
Yay!!!!! He was in a hurry to meet you  ;) Enjoy!
Congrats love how are yall both doing :)
Ugh! The magnesium drip is the worst!But I am happy for you! Congratulations. :) You will love being a mommy!
Eeekkkk another august baby!! Im due August 16th! Congrats and so happy to hear everything went well for you!
COngrats!!!I am soo jealous I still have 18 days until my due date
Congrats! Hopeu guys are doing well!
Thank you everyone. Were doing great and going home tomorrow morning. :)   feels great to have him here!

question: My lil guy made his way into this world at 3:48am July 24, 2012. He wasn't due til August 18th!! But i woke up to the feeling of my water breaking at 6:30am July 23rd. Had to get pitocin, also found out i had preeclampsia so i was put on a magnesium IV and that stuff is horrible! But i only had to push for about 20 minutes, and being a ftm that's pretty quick!   Matthias James weighed in at 6 lbs 4 oz and i'm so happy he is here!
title: he's here!!!
